executiveSummary: Liv Bowser, founder of Liberate, pitched her mental fitness studio concept seeking $200,000 for 10% equity. The business combines mindfulness, journaling, and movement to promote mental wellness for individuals and corporate teams. Despite positive feedback on the mission and concept, all Sharks declined to invest due to low sales, high valuation, and unclear scalability.

actionItems.task: Raise prices to reflect premium value and improve scalability
Hire a sales manager to expand corporate partnerships
Continue learning about market fit and refine the business model

nextSteps: Liv Bowser plans to continue growing Liberate independently, refining pricing, sales strategy, and market approach to attract future investors.
